title: The Mole and the chewing gum
creator_credit: Zdenek Miler, H. Kilianove, H. Mauricova, J. Forman and Kratky Film
brief_description: An animated film about a mole who discovers some chewing gum and gets into a sticky situation. Story by J. A. Novotny. Music by Milos Vacek. Animated by J. Doubrava, O. Kudrnac, K. Stebl, V. Maresova, Z. Bartova and J. Vokoun.
